Talk_19_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The sky is as troubled as my thoughts.
Still...<sp:5:0:0> We may yet glimpse that perfect
moon when the clouds break.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:SurpriseL_00>Hm?!


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Angry_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>This! Is this?! <sp:5:0:0>It is!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


This perfectly captures the vision of
Princess Mipha that has been burning
brightly in my mind's eye!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>...<snd:QuestionNormal_00>Wait a moment. <sp:5:1:0>You are carrying too
many items, warrior!

Please make some room and then return.<sp:5:0:0>
It is important to keep your belongings
organized and essentialized!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>I never imagined that you would show me
a drawing of Princess Mipha. I am both
moved and astounded!
Link...<sp:5:0:0> Thank you. Truly.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>As a token of my gratitude, <sp:5:0:0>please accept
this Zora sword.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Greetings, Link!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0101>The glorious reign of King Sidon has at
last begun.<sp:5:0:0> That is indeed an occasion
worthy of celebration.
It is thanks to your selfless support of
King Sidon and Queen Yona that we were
able to usher in this new age.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>I thank you for that, as do all of us Zora!<sp:5:0:0>


I hope to see you around Zora's Domain
again soon.<sp:5:0:0> You are always welcome here.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>It is thanks to your selfless support of
King Sidon and Queen Yona <sp:5:0:0>that we were
able to usher in this new age.
I thank you for that, as do all of us Zora!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>I hope to see you around Zora's Domain
again soon.<sp:5:0:0> You are always welcome here.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>I hope to see you around Zora's Domain
again soon.<sp:5:0:0> You are always welcome here.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> Greetings, Link!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0101>The domain is brimming with jubilation
<sp:5:0:0>now that our heroic King Sidon has
ascended the throne!
If only Princess Mipha were still with us.
I am certain she would be overjoyed!

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease_00>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0>


It still burns brightly in my mind's eye...
like a star that never fades, no matter
how distant.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>The vision of Princess Mipha <sp:5:0:0>grasping
her Lightscale Trident in the moonlight,<sp:5:0:0>
a gentle smile upon her face.
<snd:Sad_01>So lovely! Your breath would catch at the
sight of her, <sp:5:1:0>as though she were an
ethereal being, not flesh and blood.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>I feel so relieved. My mind is now at ease.
It is as though the sun has at last pierced
through the clouds of my mind.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Though much time has passed and so
much has changed, I am forever the loyal
subject of our Zora royals.<sp:5:1:0> To King Sidon!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Ah, my gills feel as clear as the day I was
born! <sp:5:1:0>Cheers to a new era! May it shine
brightly for years to come.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>It is something I once used myself.<sp:5:1:0>
Though it is now decayed, it has life
in it yet. Please put it to good use.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Runaway_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>KEEEAAAAAAHHH!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0901>You are still carrying too many items!<sp:5:1:0>
Even a fine warrior like you cannot best
the enemy called organization, eh?
Go forth and make some space! At once!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, Link!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>The blessed reign of King Sidon has finally
arrived.<sp:5:1:0> I cannot think of an occasion
more worthy of celebration.
If only Princess Mipha were still with us.<sp:5:0:0>
I am certain she would be overjoyed!

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease_00>*sigh*


It still burns brightly in my mind's eye...
like a star that never fades, no matter
how distant.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>The vision of Princess Mipha grasping
her Lightscale Trident in the moonlight,<sp:5:0:0>
a gentle smile upon her face.
<snd:Sad_01>So lovely! Your breath would catch at
the sight of her, <sp:5:0:0>as though she were an
ethereal being, not flesh and blood.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>It is something I once used myself.<sp:5:1:0>
Though it is now decayed, it has life
in it yet. Please put it to good use.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>What is the matter? <sp:5:0:0>Is there something
you want to show me?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I dearly wish...<sp:5:0:0>I could see <clr:0000>Princess Mipha
standing in the moonlight<clr:ffff> once more.
If only...
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Sad_01>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> Such loveliness.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>To think that I was able to set eyes on this
vision that I was so sure I would never see
again for all of my days.
Link, I cannot thank you enough. As a
token of my gratitude, please accept this
Zora sword.
Talk_03:

a gentle smile upon her face.
So lovely! Your breath would catch at the

Talk_05:

<sp:5:1:0>Ah, to see that sight once moreâ€”<clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Mipha standing in the moonlight<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_19_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It is a new moon tonight. That celestial
orb will not be terribly visible.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>I am sure there are moments when you
feel a bit sentimental yourself. There is
no shame in it.
At times like that, I find it comforting to
gaze quietly up at the moon...
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The moon is surely bright in her sky
tonight. <sp:5:0:0>How it reminds me of that
vision I seek...
Talk_19_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The sky is as troubled as my thoughts.
Still...<sp:5:0:0> When night falls, we may just
glimpse the moon as it was in my memory.
